description.text: Get help using AMIS

action.note: This is going to be a menu item

description.text: Find out about AMIS and DAISY-for-All.

dialog.note: This is the find in text dialog

description.text: Here you can search the full text in either direction.

promptItem.text: After typing in your search, press enter to begin searching.

description.text: Press to begin searching for text in the file.
Type the text to search for.

control.note: This indicates the direction of the search
This indicates the direction of the search

dialog.note: This dialog appears when more than one book is on a CD-ROM

description.text: More than one book was found on this CD. Please select a book from the list below and press Alt + O to open.
Press to close this dialog and open the selected book.
Use the arrow keys to move around this list of titles.

dialog.note: This dialog gives some basic information about AMIS.

description.text: Dialog with information about AMIS software.

dialog.note: This dialog is for searching your hard drive for DAISY books.

description.text: You can search your computer for DAISY books. Enter a path or browse for a folder to search, then press Search to begin searching.
Type the path to the folder in this field.
Press to start searching.
Press to stop searching.

promptItem.note: This is used in the sentence "7 files were found"

description.text: Use the arrow keys to move around this list of titles.
Press to open the selected title.

dialog.note: This dialog lets the user control rendering of skippable structures.

description.text: This book contains the following special types of items. Checked items will be played. Unchecked items will be skipped.
Use the arrow keys to move around this list of skippable items.

dialog.note: This dialog lets the user set some basic preferences for AMIS.

description.text: Here you can set general preferences for AMIS.
Use the arrow keys to move around this list of voices

caption.text: Highlight text as it is read aloud
Load the most recently read book on startup
You are currently using AMIS in:

description.text: Use the arrow keys to move around this list of languages.

dialog.note: This dialog lets the user jump to a certain page

description.text: Here you can jump to a page number or page label.

promptItem.text: After typing in your page number, press enter to go there.

description.text: Press this button to go to the desired page.
Type the number or label of the page you want to go to.

dialog.note: This dialog contains publication metadata and feedback about the user's current position.

caption.text: Information about this publication and your current position:

dialog.note: This dialog lets the user set text style properties.

description.text: Here you can change text style properties.
Use the arrow keys to move around this list of font names.
Use the arrow keys to move around this list of colors.
Use the arrow keys to move around this list of colors.

dialog.note: This is the open URL dialog

description.text: Enter the URL of the book you want to open:

promptItem.text: After typing in the URL, press enter.

description.text: Type the URL in this field.
Press to load the URL

promptItem.text: Press Alt + C to close the dialog.
Press Alt + C to cancel the dialog.
Press the space bar to toggle the value.
Hit tab to move around the options on the dialog.
Press control + 2 to switch to the colors dialog.
Press control + 3 to switch to the language options dialog.
Press control + 1 to switch to the general preferences dialog.
Press enter to close the dialog.
Press to open the folder browse dialog.
Press OK to close this dialog.
This list will be read automatically.
Press Control + R to repeat the last prompt.
This dialog is not yet self-voicing.
Press Control + I to hear instructions for this dialog.
Press Control + T to repeat the text in the last text box.
Select a folder from the directory below.
The folder %s does not exist. Do you want the folder to be created?
This folder name is invalid. Please choose another.
This folder can not be created. Please double check.

promptItem.note: All numerals should be translated into numerals, not words.
This is used in the context of a sequence of key presses, as in "Press Alt + V, followed by S"

promptItem.text: The location of the book you are looking for has changed. A different book was found instead. Did the contents of your CD-ROM drive change?
An error occurred while trying to open the book.
There is not a CD in the CD-ROM drive.
Plug-in error: init() function not found in the plug-in DLL.
Plug-in error: The following plug-in library could not be loaded:
You are now using the basic view mode. Press F11 to switch back to the default view mode.
Use the "search for books" feature, under the file menu, to find DAISY books on your hard drive.
Then, type the path of the folder you want in the text box.
Please restart to see your changes.
No DAISY books were found on this CD-ROM.
